argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | vcgcl.1 | |- G = ( 1st ` W ) |
| 2 |  | vcgcl.2 | |- X = ran G |
| 3 | 1 | #P_vcgrp | |- ( W e. CVecOLD -> G e. GrpOp ) |
| 4 | 2 | #P_grpocl | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( A G B ) e. X ) |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_syl3an1 | |- ( ( W e. CVecOLD /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( A G B ) e. X ) |
